name: Pirate Simulator Itch Edition
description:
pirate simulator is a game where you play as a pirate, and collect treasure chests, or use your bird to destroy a pirate ship! using your coins, you buy a new level status from your ship roommate, the more levels, the more faster and color changes your bird gets! getting max level will give you a golden version of.. YOU! play pirate simulator now! what are you waiting for? its Free, and gamepad compatable!! so join in!

P: use your parrot

Space: jump

ASWD/Arrow keys: move or scroll in control settings

C: collect

Q: talk to your ship roommate

escape/E: open control settings (control settings include: normal keys, inverted left/right keys, inverted up/down keys, and all inverted)
